completed_tasks.title: Create a radient sun component
completed_tasks.description: Replace the default Vite + React logos with a beautiful gradient sun component

history.details: Implemented RadientSun component with SVG gradients and interactive brightness that responds to clicks

completed_tasks.notes: Created an SVG-based sun with radial gradient effects that replaces the default Vite landing page icons. Added interactive features where the sun brightens as the counter increases.

completed_tasks.title: Create interactive career rays
completed_tasks.description: Enhance the sun component with interactive rays representing career engagements

history.details: Implemented interactive career rays with modal popups showing engagement details

completed_tasks.notes:
1. Made rays of the Sun radiate all around with animated random movement using requestAnimationFrame
2. Each ray represents a career engagement with a client
3. Displayed 10 rays for 10 different client engagements with unique colors
4. Added modal popup showing client engagement details when clicking on a ray

project_info.name: Career Reflection App
project_info.description: An interactive visualization of career engagements using React and SVG
